title: Career Opportunities After a Cloud Computing Course
excerpt: Explore roles, skills, and pathways after learning AWS/Azure.
content: Cloud computing opens roles such as Cloud Engineer, DevOps Engineer, and Solutions Architect. Skills in AWS/Azure, IaC, and CI/CD are in demand.

content: Full stack covers frontend (React), backend (Node/Express), databases (Mongo/MySQL), and DevOps basics.
